hero.name: Tomi
hero.title: Web Developer
hero.subtitle: I develop web, mobile, and native desktop applications

about.title: About Me
about.description: I've been working in software development for 5 years, mainly with .NET, and I feel most at home on the backend. That said, I'm also comfortable with frontend development, primarily using React. I enjoy learning new things, so I occasionally dive into mobile development (React Native) and desktop apps (Electron) as well. I'm always looking for ways to improve myself.

experience.subtitle: What I have done so far

freelancer.description: In the meantime, I started working on smaller projects, including developing websites as well as Telegram and Discord bots
